Amplitude.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] Increase the range of Oppressor Mine beams by {scale=20|20}%.

Beam Me Up.card_desc: [Transporter] Increase the Flight Speed of Transporter by {scale=10|10}%.

Bob and Weave.card_desc: [Transporter] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=27|27}% for 2s after Teleporting with Transporter.

Calibrate.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with your Sniper Rifle in Carbine mode lowers the Cooldown of Transporter by {scale=0.12|0.12}s.

Eagle Eye.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase the damage done by Headshots by an additional 25% of base for a total of 175% damage.

Generator.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] Reduce the Cooldown of Oppressor Mine by {scale=1.225|1.225}s.

Lie in Wait.card_desc: [Armor] After 2s of standing still, regenerate {scale=1|1} Ammo every 2s.

Octoppressor.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] Increase the number of targets affected by Oppressor Mines by {scale=1|1}.

Open Season.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Hitting an enemy with a fully-charged Sniper Mode shot generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Prodigy.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Increase your Movement Speed while in Sniper Mode by {scale=25|25}%.

Quick Scope.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Reduce scope-in and scope-out time by {scale=20|20}%.

Reposition.card_desc: [Transporter] Using Transporter instantly Teleports you to its target location.

Restore.card_desc: [Transporter] Heal for {scale=10|10}% of your maximum Health after Teleporting with Transporter.

Steady Aim.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] For 7s after hitting a fully-charged weapon shot, your next fully-charged shot will deal an additional 30% damage.

True Grit.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Hitting an enemy with a fully-charged Sniper Mode shot Heals you for {scale=100|100}.

Well-Stocked.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] Activating Oppressor Mine generates {scale=3|3} Ammo.

Adlerauge.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht den Kopfschussschaden um zusätzliche 25% auf 175% des Grundschadens.

Ausschlag.card_desc: [Drosselmine] Erhöht die Reichweite der Strahlen von Drosselminen um {scale=20|20}%.

Beamer.card_desc: [Transporter] Erhöht das Flugtempo von Transporter um {scale=10|10}%.

Dickkopf.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Generator.card_desc: [Drosselmine] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Drosselmine um {scale=1.225|1.225}s.

Gut gef\u00fcllt.card_desc: [Drosselmine] Die Aktivierung von Drosselmine erzeugt {scale=3|3} Munition.

Husch-Husch.card_desc: [Transporter] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach der Teleportation durch Transporter 2s lang um {scale=27|27}%.

Lauer.card_desc: [Rüstung] Stehst du 2s lang still, wird anschließend alle 2s {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Neukonfiguration.card_desc: [Transporter] Die Aktivierung von Transporter erzeugt {scale=4|4} Munition.

Offene Jagd.card_desc: [Sniper-Modus] Treffer mit voll aufgeladenem Schuss im Sniper-Modus erzeugen {scale=1|1} Munition.

Oktopressor.card_desc: [Drosselmine] Drosselminen können bis zu {scale=1|1} weitere Gegner betreffen.

Ortswechsel.card_desc: [Transporter] Die Teleportation durch Transporter wird ohne Verzögerung ausgelöst.

Schnellvisier.card_desc: [Sniper-Modus] Reduziert die zum Heran- oder Herauszoomen benötigte Zeit um {scale=20|20}%.

Wahrer Mut.card_desc: [Sniper-Modus] Triffst du mit einem voll aufgeladenen Schuss im Sniper-Modus, wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Wiederherstellen.card_desc: [Transporter] Nach der Teleportation zu deinem Transporter wirst du um {scale=10|10}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit geheilt.

Wunderkind.card_desc: [Sniper-Modus] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Sniper-Modus um {scale=25|25}%.

Zielwasser.card_desc: [Sniper-Modus] Triffst du mit einem voll aufgeladenen Schuss, verursacht dein nächster innerhalb von 7s 30% mehr Schaden.

\u00c0 l'aff\u00fbt.card_desc: [Armure] Après 2s d'immobilité, vous regagnez {scale=1|1} munition(s) toutes les 2s.

Amplitude.card_desc: [Mine suppress.] La portée d'effet des Mines de suppression augmente de {scale=20|20}%.

Bien approvisionn\u00e9e.card_desc: [Mine suppress.] Activer une mine rend {scale=3|3} munitions.

Calibrage.card_desc: [Arme] Réussir un tir de carabine réduit le temps de recharge du transporteur de {scale=0.12|0.12}s.

Collimateur.card_desc: [Arme] Les tirs dans la tête infligent 25% de dégâts supplémentaires, donc 175% au total.

Courage.card_desc: [Mode sniper] Chaque tir entièrement chargé et réussi vous redonne {scale=100|100} PV.

G\u00e9n\u00e9rateur.card_desc: [Mine suppress.] Mine de suppression se recharge {scale=1.225|1.225}s plus vite.

Prodige.card_desc: [Mode sniper] Votre vitesse en visant augmente de {scale=25|25}%.

Restauration.card_desc: [Transporteur] Transporteur vous redonne {scale=10|10}% de vos PV max. au moment de la téléportation.

Saison ouverte.card_desc: [Mode sniper] Chaque tir entièrement chargé et réussi redonne {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Suppresseur.card_desc: [Mine de suppression] Les Mines de suppression atteignent {scale=1|1} ennemi(s) de plus.

T\u00e9l\u00e9portation, Scotty.card_desc: [Transporteur] La vitesse du projectile de Transporteur augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Tergiversation.card_desc: [Transporteur] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=27|27}% pendant 2s après l'utilisation du Transporteur.

Vis\u00e9e rapide.card_desc: [Mode sniper] Le temps pour activer ou désactiver la lunette diminue de {scale=20|20}%.

Vis\u00e9e s\u00fbre.card_desc: [Mode sniper] Pendant 7s après avoir réussi un tir entièrement chargé, le prochain tir entièrement chargé inflige 30% de dégâts en plus.

\u4f11\u517b\u751f\u606f.card_desc: [护甲] 站立不动1秒后，每秒都将回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u4fbf\u643a\u5f0f\u53d1\u7535\u673a.card_desc: [压制陷阱] 压制陷阱生成时间缩短{scale=1.225|1.225}秒

\u529f\u7387\u653e\u5927.card_desc: [压制陷阱] 压制陷阱的光束射程提高{scale=20|20}%

\u533b\u7597\u4f20\u9001.card_desc: [传送装置] 利用传送装置进行传送后可以治疗你最大生命值的{scale=10|10}%

\u5954\u8dd1\u5c04\u51fb.card_desc: [狙击模式] 开镜瞄准状态下的移动速度增加{scale=25|25}%

\u6709\u5907\u65e0\u60a3.card_desc: [压制陷阱] 部署陷阱后回复{scale=3|3}发弹药

\u6821\u51c6\u5668.card_desc: [武器] 你每次成功的武器攻击都将减少传送装置的冷却时间{scale=0.12|0.12}秒

\u72e9\u730e\u5b63\u8282.card_desc: [狙击模式] 你的狙击攻击将暴露敌人位置{scale=1|1}秒

\u7a33\u5b9a\u51c6\u5fc3.card_desc: [狙击模式] 完全充能的攻击在命中后会使下一次完全充能的攻击伤害提高30%。间隔最多7秒

\u7ae0\u9c7c\u578b\u9677\u9631.card_desc: [压制陷阱] 受到压制陷阱影响的敌人受到的治疗效果降低{scale=16|16}%

\u80fd\u91cf\u8865\u7ed9.card_desc: [武器] 获得击杀会回复{scale=4|4}发弹药

\u8bbe\u5907\u91cd\u7f6e.card_desc: [传送装置] 激活传送装置会回复{scale=4|4}点弹药

\u91cd\u5fc3\u8c03\u6574.card_desc: [传送器] 传送器现在会立即生效

\u94c1\u8840.card_desc: [狙击模式] 完全充能的射击命中敌人时，自身回复{scale=100|100}点生命值

\u95ea\u817e\u632a\u79fb.card_desc: [传送装置] 部署传送装置或者进行传送之后2秒内，你的移动速度增加{scale=27|27}%

\u9e70\u773c.card_desc: [武器] 爆头造成的伤害提高50%

Amplitude.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] Increase the beam range of Oppressor Mines by 30%.

Bob and Weave.card_desc: [Transporter]  Increase your movement speed by 40% for 2s after deploying or teleporting through transporter.

Generator.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce the time it takes your Sniper shots to fully charge by {0.15}s

Headstrong.card_desc: [Armadura] Recibes un 10 % menos de daño de ataques de AdE por cada enemigo cercano, hasta un máximo de 50 %.

Octoppressor.card_desc: [Oppressor Mines] Oppressor Mines may target 1 additional enemies.

Open Season.card_desc: [Weapon] Your Weapon attacks reveal enemies for 3s.

Prodigy.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Increase your movement speed while scoped by 25%.

Quick Scope.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Reduce the time it takes to scope in and scope out by 25%.

Restore.card_desc: [Transporter] Heal for 10% of maximum health after teleporting to your Transporter beacon.

Tracking.card_desc: [Oppressor Mine] Enemies Affected by your Oppressor Mines are revealed to you for 10s.

Amplitud.card_desc: [Mina opresora] El alcance del rayo de las Minas opresoras aumenta un {scale=20|20}%.

Bien equipado.card_desc: [Mina opresora] Recuperas {scale=3|3} de munición al activar Mina opresora.

Calibrar.card_desc: [Arma] Si alcanzas a un enemigo con Rifle francotirador en modo Carabina, la recarga de Transportador se reduce en {scale=0.12|0.12}s.

Dotaci\u00f3n de energ\u00eda.card_desc: [Arma] Los golpes de gracia recuperan {scale=4|4} de munición.

Generador.card_desc: [Mina opresora] Se reduce la recarga de Mina opresora en {scale=1.225|1.225}s.

Mira firme.card_desc: [Modo francotirador] Durante 7s después de acertar con un disparo de arma totalmente cargado, tu siguiente disparo totalmente cargado infligirá un 30% más de daño.

Mira r\u00e1pida.card_desc: [Modo francotirador] Se reduce el tiempo que te lleva acercarte y alejarte la mira un {scale=20|20}%.

Octopresor.card_desc: [Mina opresora] El número de objetivos afectados por Mina opresora aumenta en {scale=1|1}.

Ojo de \u00e1guila.card_desc: [Arma] El daño de tus disparos a la cabeza aumentan un 25% del daño base para un daño total del 175%.

Prodigio.card_desc: [Modo Francotirador] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=25|25}% mientras estás en modo francotirador.

Reconfigurar.card_desc: [Transportador] Recuperas {scale=4|4} de munición al activar Transportador.

Recuperar.card_desc: [Transportador] Recuperas un {scale=10|10}% de tu salud máxima tras usar Transportador.

Reposici\u00f3n.card_desc: [Transportador] Te teletransportas automáticamente a la ubicación objetivo al usar Transportador.

Teletransp\u00f3rtame.card_desc: [Transportador] La velocidad de vuelo de Transportador aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Testarudez.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Amplitude.card_desc: [Mina Opressora] Aumenta em {scale=20|20}% o alcance das Minas Opressoras.

Bem-abastecida.card_desc: [Mina Opressora] Ativar a Mina Opressora dá {scale=3|3} munições adicionais.

Mira Est\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Sniper Mode] Após atingir um inimigo com um disparo totalmente carregado, o próximo disparo totalmente carregado dado dentro de 7s causa 30% mais de dano.

Octopressor.card_desc: [Minas opressoras] Aumenta em {scale=1|1} o número de inimigos afetados pelas Minas Opressoras.

Reposi\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Transportador] Ao usar o Transportador você instantaneamente se transporta para o local de destino.

Restaurar.card_desc: [Transportador] Cura {scale=10|10}% de vida máxima após se teleportar usando o Transportador.

S\u00f3 Observo.card_desc: [Armadura] Após 2s parada, recupera {scale=1|1} de munição a cada 2s.

Teleporte, por favor.card_desc: [Transportador] Aumenta a velocidade de voo do Transportador em {scale=10|10}%.

\u0410\u043c\u043f\u043b\u0438\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Подавляющая мина] Дальность действия луча Подавляющих мин увеличивается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u044b\u04.card_desc: [Снайперский режим] Время настройки прицела сокращается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0413\u0435\u043d\u0435\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Подавляющая мина] Перезарядка Подавляющей мины сокращается на {scale=1.225|1.225} с.

\u0417\u0430\u043b\u0435\u0447\u044c \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Простояв неподвижно в течение 2 с., вы восстанавливаете {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов каждые 2 с.

\u0417\u0430\u0440\u044f\u0434 \u0431\u0.card_desc: [Транспортер] После телепортации через транспортер вы исцеляетесь на {scale=10|10}% от вашего максимального здоровья.

\u0418\u0441\u0442\u043e\u0447\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Нанесение смертельного удара генерирует {scale=4|4} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041a\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0431\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Попадание по врагу из снайперской винтовки сокращает перезарядку Транспортера на {scale=0.12|0.12}с .

\u041d\u0430\u0441\u0442\u043e\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Снайперский режим] Попадание по врагу полностью заряженным выстрелом исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041e\u043a\u0442\u043e\u043f\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Подавляющая мина] Число целей, на которых действуют Подавляющие мины, увеличивается на {scale=1|1}.

\u041e\u0440\u043b\u0438\u043d\u044b\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Урон от попаданий в голову повышается на 25% от базового и достигает в общей сложности 175%.

\u041f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u044b\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Подавляющая мина] Активация Подавляющей мины генерирует {scale=3|3} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0421\u0435\u0437\u043e\u043d \u043e\u0.card_desc: [Снайперский режим] Попадания по врагам полностью заряженными выстрелами генерируют {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0421\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0430 \u043f\u0.card_desc: [Транспортер] Телепортация через транспортер повышает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=27|27}% на 2 с.

\u0422\u0430\u043b\u0430\u043d\u0442.card_desc: [Снайперский режим] При использовании прицела ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=25|25}%.

\u0422\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0434\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Снайперский режим] В течение 7 с. после полностью заряженного выстрела следующий полностью заряженный выстрел нанесет на 30% больше урона.

\u0423\u043f\u0440\u044f\u043c\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

Generator.card_desc: [Mina opresyjna] Skraca czas odnowienia Miny opresyjnej o {scale=1.225|1.225} s.

Kalibracja.card_desc: [Broń] Trafienie wroga karabinem snajperskim w trybie karabinka skraca czas odnowienia Transportera o {scale=0.12|0.12} s.

Pe\u0142ne zaopatrzenie.card_desc: [Mina opresyjna] Aktywacja Miny opresyjnej generuje {scale=3|3} szt. amunicji.

Pewna r\u0119ka.card_desc: [Tryb snajperski] Przez 7 s po trafieniu w pełni naładowanym strzałem z broni twój następny w pełni naładowany strzał zada dodatkowe 30% obrażeń.

Szybka luneta.card_desc: [Tryb snajperski] Skraca czas wejścia i wyjścia z trybu lunety o {scale=20|20}%.

W oczekiwaniu.card_desc: [Pancerz] Przywraca {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji co 2 s po 2 s bezruchu.

Ger\u00e7ek Metanet.card_desc: [Keskin Nişancı Modu] Bir düşmanı tamamen yüklenmiş bir atışla vurmak seni {scale=100|100} Can iyileştirir.

Hedef \u015ea\u015fmaz.card_desc: [Keskin Nişancı Modu] Tam yüklenmiş bir silah atışıyla vurduktan sonra 7sn boyunca bir sonraki tam yüklenmiş silah atışın %30 ek hasar verir.

H\u0131zl\u0131 D\u00fcrb\u00fcn.card_desc: [Keskin Nişancı Modu] Dürbünü açıp kapatmak için gereken zamanı %{scale=20|20} azalt.

Jenerat\u00f6r.card_desc: [Gaddar Mayın] Gaddar Mayın'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1.225|1.225}sn azalt.

Kalibre Et.card_desc: [Silah] Bir düşmanı Karabina modunda Keskin Nişan Tüfeği ile vurduğunda Taşıyıcı'nın Bekleme Süresi {scale=0.12|0.12}sn azalır.

Kartal G\u00f6z\u00fc.card_desc: [Silah] Kafadan Vuruşlar ile verilen hasarı, taban hasarın %25'i kadar artır. Bu toplamda en fazla %175 hasar olabilir.

Tabana Kuvvet.card_desc: [Taşıyıcı] Taşıyıcı ile ışınlandıktan sonra Hareket Hızın 2sn boyunca %{scale=27|27} artar.

Yeniden Yerle\u015fme.card_desc: [Taşıyıcı] Taşıyıcı kullanımı ile anında hedef konuma Işınlanırsın.

Yenileme.card_desc: [Taşıyıcı] Taşıyıcı ışınlandıktan sonra maksimum Canının %{scale=10|10} kadarı iyileş.
